thread.title: 5 Easy Steps To Glow Like Shibani Dandekar
thread.title_full: 5 Easy Steps To Glow Like Shibani Dandekar

title: 5 Easy Steps To Glow Like Shibani Dandekar
text:
üôãüèæ#Repost @shoebmashadi „Éª„Éª„Éª Republic of brown @shibanidandekar @thatbrowngirl #thatbrowngirl A post shared by Shibani Dandekar (@shibanidandekar) on Jan 24, 2017 at 11:34pm PST 
Then use a warm coloured, peachish pink blush, like the Bobbi Brown Blush in Apricot , or Faces Glam On Perfect Blush in Cocktail Peach , to add some colour to your cheeks. 
Next up, use a product, like Bobbi Brown Shimmer Brick Compact in Bronze , to give your skin a bronze-y look, along with a touch of shine. 
And, lastly, there would be no glow without highlighter, so use an illuminator like Freedom Professional Pro Studio Strobe Cream or Colorbar Radiant Glow Face Illuminator to highlight key areas on your face. 
Also, to make your glow pop even more, use a bit of highlighter or shimmery nude-ish eye shadow in the inner corner of your eyes.
